sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.608. Mese di Settembre 1795. Quartetto per due violini, viola, e violoncello di Luigi Boccherini, compositor di camera di S.M. il Re di Prussia
sources.ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.609. Copy made in Berlin for Frederick William II
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 39 no. 9 (Book 1 no. 3; for title and comment, see No. 234)

entries.notes: Arrangement: Of the third movement, as part of a quartet (no. 1) for clarinet, flute, horn and bassoon, by O. Van den Broek, c. 1810 (see No. 262). MSS.: No MSS. of any kind are known.

partial_notes: Entry shows Trio marking in second movement incipit.
